item.title: Logical characterizations of recurrent graph neural networks with reals and floats
item.description: Recurrent Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) with real and floating-point numbers are precisely characterized by rule-based and infinitary modal logics, respectively, enabling a deeper understanding of thei…
